value.title: DAX Fridays! #173: 8 Best practices for Time Intelligence  in Power BI
value.excerpt: Follow this rules to get your time intelligence functions working in Power BI.  Disable auto date/Time: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d4yAzhIQqNk  Avoid bi-directional relationships in calendars: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IlxqDCIuarU  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center

value.title: Dynamically find header rows and promote them in Power Query
value.excerpt: Dynamically find a column header and promote them in power query is  a very common requirement, specially if you are importing data from excel or pdfs for example.  In today's video, I will show you how to do that with just a few simple steps!  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center

value.title: How to embed Power BI in Sharepoint Online

value.title: Basic Sharing, and Manage Permissions in Power BI Simple, but Useful
value.excerpt: Power BI provides multiple ways of sharing content with users. Each sharing method has pros and cons and can be used for specific scenarios. Some of the sharing methods can be used together to build a framework for sharing. In this post, I will talk about the most basic way of sharing Power BI content.

value.title: Work with Power BI visuals
value.excerpt: Learn how to choose from the exceptional visuals that Power BI makes available to you. Formatting visuals will direct the user’s attention to exactly where you want it, while helping to make the visual easier to read and interpret. You will also learn about how to use key performance indicators (KPIs).
